Description: Book of the Dead of Mutemwia; frame 2; judgement-scene vignettes.
Curator's comments: According to Quirke 1993, 45 (no. 114) pBM EA 10003 and pBM EA 10006 are part of the same papyrus; pBM EA 10003 = Barker 219 (not 215).
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (114)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (134534) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/134534)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: abraded, cockled, copper degradation, delaminating, fractured, turnovers Black ink Red ink Pigment (flaking) Backed: linen Edged: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: cloth Object Priority: C Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: D Curatorial condition comment: fair - much smudging
